channel.title: poetry on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in poetry on Konigi

item.title: Dope O’ Mine
item.description: reduced me to puddles and aftershocks exhausted limbs and tousled locks lit me up and shook my spine can’t get enough of that dope o’ mine

item.title: You, Me, We
item.description: You You caught me looking You have beautiful eyes You hear that a lot I’m sure I I froze up I wanted to say hi I lost my nerve We We stood in line We made contact We made eye contact

item.title: Fruit and Suffering
item.description: Fruit and suffering New life and old skin Shed the failure and bruises The wounds and mediocrity Today I begin Born anew A vineyard of bruises is my birthplace
